message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I think I deserve a bigger share, since you rejected my 50/50 proposal. But this is a good starting point for negotiation.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more. Your turn to consider!
Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to give you a larger share, but I still need to get a good portion of the money.
I'm not willing to give up much more. You need to make a better offer if you want to get more.

This is my final offer. I'm willing to give you a significant share, but I need to secure a majority to make this worthwhile.  If you reject this, I'm going to keep going until the money is worth nothing to you.
